ygData.subject: Re: Banded Difficulty - Second Time Asking
ygData.msgSnippet: Gorget and bracer the easiest Belt Sleeves Boots Helm Mask Cloak Mail Leggings Mantle or pretty close to this, my experience at 125 skill ...
ygData.messageBody:
Gorget and bracer the easiest
Belt
Sleeves
Boots
Helm
Mask
Cloak
Mail
Leggings
Mantle

or pretty close to this, my experience at 125 skill

--- John Robertson <johnr@...> wrote:
> From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>
> Sorry to pester everyone...
>
> Is there a chart somewhere of the relative
> difficulties of the various banded pieces?
>
> I know cloaks are really hard, and that gorgets and
> bracers are really easy (relatively
> speaking), but what about in between?
>
> Are belts hard? Or have I just been unlucky?
>
> Jyzan
